text: 13:2 Matyu 17:20; 21:21; Mak 11:23; Luk 17:6; 1 Korin 12:8-10; 12:28Eghtɨ God gavgavim na danightɨ, kɨ an otivir akabar gun mɨgeir gavgavim ikɨva, Godɨn nɨghnɨzir mogomebagh fogh, fofozir avɨriba bar ikɨva, nan nɨghnɨzir gavgavim bar ekevegh na damutɨ kɨ mɨghsɨaba munamangamin gavgavim ikɨ, egh kɨ igharaz darazigh ifongeghan koghɨva, kɨ mati pura bizim.
